trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around April 1st 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsstanding outside the chevron gas station I saw what looked to be a flare of some sort....it shot through the sky, red and orange in color. Was very fast as it darted across the sky and just disappeared. Happened so quick but was so weird, there was NO noise at all.
